019
020import com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariConfig;
021import com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Dialect;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.SQLEngine;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageEngine;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageManager;
029import org.intellij.lang.annotations.Language;
030
031import java.io.File;
032import java.sql.Connection;
033import java.sql.DatabaseMetaData;
034import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
035import java.sql.ResultSet;
036import java.sql.SQLException;
037import java.util.Map;
038
039/**
040 * SQLConnector
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class SQLConnector implements StorageConnector<Connection> {
046
047  protected HikariDataSource dataSource;
048
049  protected String sourceClass;
050  protected String driverClass;
051
052  /**
053   * Used to initialize a connection to the specified {@link StorageEngine}
054   */
055  @Override
056  public void initialize() {
057
058    findDriverSource();
059
060    final HikariConfig config = new HikariConfig();
061
062    if(sourceClass != null) {
063      config.setDataSourceClassName(sourceClass);
064    }
065
066    //String file, String host, int port, String database
067    config.addDataSourceProperty("url",
068                                 ((SQLEngine)StorageManager.instance().getEngine()).url(
069                                         new File(PluginCore.directory(), StorageManager.instance().settings().fileName()).getAbsolutePath(),
070                                         StorageManager.instance().settings().host(),
071                                         StorageManager.instance().settings().port(),
072                                         StorageManager.instance().settings().database()
073                                                                                       ));
074
075    config.addDataSourceProperty("user", StorageManager.instance().settings().user());
076    config.addDataSourceProperty("password", StorageManager.instance().settings().password());
077
078    config.setPoolName(StorageManager.instance().settings().poolName());
079    config.setConnectionTestQuery("SELECT 1");
080    config.setMaximumPoolSize(StorageManager.instance().settings().maxPool());
081    config.setMaxLifetime(StorageManager.instance().settings().maxLife());
082    config.setConnectionTimeout(StorageManager.instance().settings().timeout());
083
084    for(final Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : ((SQLEngine)StorageManager.instance().getEngine()).properties().entrySet()) {
085      config.addDataSourceProperty(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
086    }
087
088    this.dataSource = new HikariDataSource(config);
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Used to get the connection from the
093   *
094   * @return The connection.
095   */
096  @Override
097  public Connection connection() throws SQLException {
098
099    if(dataSource == null) initialize();
100    return dataSource.getConnection();
101  }
102
103  public boolean checkVersion() {
104
105    boolean result = true;
106
107    if(dialect().requirement().equalsIgnoreCase("none")) return true;
108
109    try(final Connection connection = connection()) {
110      final DatabaseMetaData meta = connection.getMetaData();
111      final String version = dialect().parseVersion(meta.getDatabaseProductVersion());
112
113      PluginCore.log().debug("SQL Requirement: " + dialect().requirement(), DebugLevel.OFF);
114      PluginCore.log().debug("SQL Version: " + version, DebugLevel.OFF);
115      result = dialect().checkRequirement(version);
116
117    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
118      PluginCore.log().error("Issue attempting to access SQL Version.");
119    }
120    return result;
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Used to execute a prepared query.
125   *
126   * @param query     The query string.
127   * @param variables An array of variables for the prepared statement.
128   *
129   * @return The {@link ResultSet}.
130   */
131  public ResultSet executeQuery(@Language("SQL") final String query, final Object[] variables) {
132
133    try(final Connection connection = connection();
134        final PreparedStatement statement = connection.prepareStatement(query)) {
135
136      for(int i = 0; i < variables.length; i++) {
137        statement.setObject((i + 1), variables[i]);
138      }
139      return statement.executeQuery();
140
141    } catch(final SQLException e) {
142      PluginCore.log().sqlError("", e, query, variables, DebugLevel.OFF);
143    }
144    return null;
145  }
146
147  /**
148   * Used to execute a prepared update.
149   *
150   * @param query     The query string.
151   * @param variables An array of variables for the prepared statement.
152   *
153   * @return True to indicate that the statement has executed successfully, otherwise false.
154   */
155  public int executeUpdate(@Language("SQL") final String query, final Object[] variables) {
156
157    try(final Connection connection = connection();
158        final PreparedStatement statement = connection.prepareStatement(query)) {
159
160      for(int i = 0; i < variables.length; i++) {
161        statement.setObject((i + 1), variables[i]);
162      }
163      return statement.executeUpdate();
164    } catch(final SQLException e) {
165      PluginCore.log().sqlError("", e, query, variables, DebugLevel.OFF);
166    }
167    return 0;
168  }
169
170  public Dialect dialect() {
171
172    return ((SQLEngine)StorageManager.instance().getEngine()).dialect();
173  }
174
175  protected void findDriverSource(final SQLEngine engine) {
176
177    for(final String source : engine.dataSource()) {
178
179      if(sourceClass != null) {
180        break;
181      }
182
183      try {
184
185        Class.forName(source);
186
187        this.sourceClass = source;
188      } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
189    }
190
191    for(final String driver : engine.driver()) {
192
193      if(driverClass != null) {
194        break;
195      }
196
197      try {
198
199        Class.forName(driver);
200
201        this.driverClass = driver;
202      } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
203    }
204  }
205
206  protected void findDriverSource() {
207
208    findDriverSource((SQLEngine)StorageManager.instance().getEngine());
209  }
210}
